message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%. What do you say?
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. It's a good starting point for us to work with.
I'm not comfortable with the 55-45 split. I'll offer 60-40 instead.
I'm willing to compromise on a 60-40 split. I think this is a fairer distribution of the $10000.
